title: Print, "Bird Hunt", 1730–50
medium: Engraving with etching with some green and blue watercolor washes on paper
inscribed: At right bottom corner: "Avec Priv du Roy."
description: A young man standing at left takes aim at a flock of birds at right. A boy holding dogs and a decoy stand beside him. A lady on horseback holds a falcon. She stands in the center under two trees. A man charges his gun, at right. Two groups of buildings in the distance.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Bird Hunt", 1730–50. Engraving with etching with some green and blue watercolor washes on paper. 1914-49-8.
